name: Rec Room
description: Rec Room is the best place to hang out with friends from all around the world! Play multiplayer games like Paintball, or just chill in the park. Discover thousands of player-created rooms, with new ones added daily. Or build your own rooms with friends. It's cross platform and free, so come and join the fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 or higher Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1400 MB available space
